name: Weekly digest
body:
This week in Armbian development saw significant updates across multiple areas, with a strong focus on bootloader enhancements and kernel upgrades. U-Boot was bumped to v2026.01-rc2 for several devices, introducing BTRFS support and improved boot management. Kernel updates included the advancement of the mainline kernel to v6.18-rc6 and the upgrade of Allwinner CURRENT kernels. Desktop usability saw improvements with fixes to shortcuts, app group management, and the addition of a default user icon. New hardware support was added for boards like AM62L EVM and expanded features for devices such as the youyeetoo-r1 and sunxi64. Additional changes included power management refinements, patch cleanups, and the introduction of new CLI tools, reflecting ongoing efforts to enhance stability and user experience. ## * Allow Helios64 to do separate /boot partition only if root placed on fs than unbootable on device. by @iav in [armbian/build#8946](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8946) * cm3588-nas: u-boot: bump to v2026.01-rc2, enable BTRFS support. by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8953](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8953) * Discord x86: add external sources. by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/build#8975](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8975) * Feat/bootscript templating. by @djurny in [armbian/build#8935](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8935) * Fix desktop shortcut for Armbian config. by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/configng#701](https://github.com/armbian/configng/pull/701) * Fixing updating Git submodule. by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/build#8962](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8962) * Improve Desktop AppGroups & Add Default User Icon. by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/build#8964](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8964) * jsoninfo: introduce `inventory-artifacts` cli. by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8910](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8910) * khadas-vim3l: u-boot: bump to v2026.01-rc2, enable BTRFS and more. by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8954](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8954) * lib / main-config.sh: enable APA extension for questing and resolute builds. by @leggewie in [armbian/build#8969](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8969) * mainline-kernel: bump 6.18 to v6.18-rc6. by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8956](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8956) * Move gxlimg to board level and some clean. by @retro98boy in [armbian/build#8948](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8948) * nanopct6(-lts): u-boot: bump to v2026.01-rc2. by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8951](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8951) * nanopi-r6c: u-boot: bump to v2026.01-rc2; enable BTRFS support. by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8955](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8955) * odroidhc4: u-boot: bump to v2026.01-rc2. by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8952](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8952) * Powere management - make it conditional, enable on UEFI targets, else disabled. by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/build#8961](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8961) * radxa-rock-4d: Move to standard support. by @HeyMeco in [armbian/build#8981](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8981) * rock-5b: u-boot: edge: bump to v2026.01-rc2; use mainline ATF; bootorder; fancy u-boot. by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8949](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8949) * Rock5B+: Udev rule for Radxa Display 8HD. by @HeyMeco in [armbian/build#8972](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8972) * Rock5B-Plus and Rock5T: Use upstream u-boot. by @HeyMeco in [armbian/build#8918](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8918) * rockchip-edge: cleanup and rewrite patches. by @EvilOlaf in [armbian/build#8911](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8911) * rockchip: cleanup and rewrite patches for `current`. by @EvilOlaf in [armbian/build#8912](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8912) * sm8250 current: Add support to load QUP SE Firmware via Linux subsystem. by @retro98boy in [armbian/build#8942](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8942) * sunxi64: Enable KVM virtualization support for current kernel. by @chbgdn in [armbian/build#8974](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8974) * Sync support status to match with /download. by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/build#8976](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8976) * ti: configs: boards: Add AM62L EVM (tmds62levm) board support. by @jonaswood01 in [armbian/build#8960](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8960) * ti: k3: Fix boot, change branch names, add upstream edge. by @jonaswood01 in [armbian/build#8926](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8926) * u-boot: prepare v2026.01 patch directory. by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8950](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8950) * uefi: x86: current (6.12) and edge (6.18): add Apple T2 patches. by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8879](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8879) * Upgrade Allwinner CURRENT kernels to latest. by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/build#8878](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8878) * youyeetoo-r1: enable OUT1/OUT2 switches for es8323 headphone output on vendor kernel. by @SuperKali in [armbian/build#8963](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8963) #
